about_the_game:
Enter a neon-charged battleground where survival meets explosive energy in this retro, space-themed twin-stick shooter! As you dance through waves of geometric adversaries, each defeated enemy leaves behind a deadly debris field—lure other enemies into these hazard zones to trigger devastating chain reactions and score multipliers.

Snag powerful upgrades that temporarily boost your ship's offensive and defensive capabilities while you craft the perfect storm of destruction, turning enemy movements into opportunities for spectacular combos. Set your own pace in this sleek, modern take on classic arcade action, where minimalist design meets pixel particle effects in a sea of vibrant colors.

Your mission is simple but addictive: survive, strategize, and transform the arena into an explosive trap as you chase the ultimate high score.

Coming Soon

  • New enemies and behaviors

  • More power-ups

  • New levels

Your Ship

Take control of the Starfighter X-7, a lightning-fast combat ship designed after a... chevron. This highly maneuverable ship comes equipped with devastating weapon systems, perfect for carving through waves of geometric baddies. Just... don't let them touch you.

Ship Upgrades

As you progress through the levels, you'll spot offensive and defensive power-ups that last for a few seconds in-game. Grab them on the map before they disappear!

Shield: Grants temporarily invulnerability

Take a breather and enjoy the briefest of reprieves.

Mega blaster: Faster rate of fire and a larger projectile

Take down enemies with ease as this weapon absolutely shreds your adversaries.

Tri-blaster: Broader spray pattern

Just aim in the general direction in the ultimate spray 'n pray armament.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Modern dual-core processor at 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Electro Havoc: A retro twin-stick shooter set in a neon-charged battleground where you'll face waves of geometric foes. Lure more enemies into debris fields to trigger chain reactions, and grab power-ups to boost your multipliers.
